name: Crabs Vs Zombies
description:
Fight off zombies and defeat Captain Death! Watch out, for it will not be easy, and you'll need to be bold if you want to survive!

Arrows to move, 

Space to attack. 

Shells in the top-left indicate your health.

 Made By Four Square Devs:

 - Eric Krawczyk

 - Josiah Chock

 - Jesse Bauer

 - Mitchell Ross

Have fun :)
